forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 80. South southwest wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between midnight and 2am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 55, with temperatures rising to around 63 overnight. Southwest wind 13 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
